mapper.update: ALTER TABLE API_ACCESS_LOG ADD PARTITION (PARTITION ${partitionName} VALUES LESS THAN (to_days(${partitionValue})));
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO API_ACCESS_LOG ( ID, USER_ID, INVOKE_METHOD, METHOD_VER, RESULT_TYPE, RESULT_CODE, RESULT_MSG, EXCEPTION, DEVICE_MANUFACTURER, DEVICE_MODEL, SYSTEM_VER, APP_VER, VISIT_DATE, IP, INVOKE_PARAM, VISIT_TIME_COST ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{invokeMethod}, #{methodVer}, #{resultType}, #{resultCode}, #{resultMsg}, #{exception}, #{deviceManufacturer}, #{deviceModel}, #{systemVer}, #{appVer}, #{visitDate}, #{ip}, #{invokeParam}, #{visitTimeCost} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE API_ACCESS_LOG
USER_ID = #{userId},
INVOKE_METHOD = #{invokeMethod},
METHOD_VER = #{methodVer},
RESULT_TYPE = #{resultType},
RESULT_CODE = #{resultCode},
DEVICE_MANUFACTURER = #{deviceManufacturer},
DEVICE_MODEL = #{deviceModel},
SYSTEM_VER = #{systemVer},
APP_VER = #{appVer},
VISIT_DATE = #{visitDate},
IP = #{ip},
INVOKE_PARAM = #{invokeParam},
VISIT_TIME_COST = #{visitTimeCost}
WHERE ID = #{id}
